name: Minor League Golf Tour
pathway_summary: Year-round 1-day & 2-day professional and amateur events. Ideal for developing competitive reps and building tournament rhythm.

name: West Florida Golf Tour
pathway_summary: Strong 1-day & series-based events, ideal for sharpening scoring and staying sharp during PGA TOUR Americas/Korn Ferry off-season.

name: All Pro Tour
pathway_summary: Professional 4-day events feeding into Korn Ferry Tour Monday qualifiers.

name: GPro Tour
pathway_summary: Carolina-based 2-day/3-day professional tournaments used by many Korn Ferry/PGA TOUR hopefuls.

name: Dakotas Tour
pathway_summary: Summer-long professional tour with large purses and deeply competitive professional fields.

name: Tartan Tour
pathway_summary: UK-based mini-tour providing competitive reps between Clutch Pro Tour and Challenge Tour Q-School.

name: Nordic Golf League
pathway_summary: Official third-tier European Tour pathway. Strong fields and direct access to Challenge Tour.

name: Alps Tour
pathway_summary: Third-tier European Tour pathway with strong Q-School structure and direct promotion to Challenge Tour.

name: Asian Development Tour
pathway_summary: Official development pathway to the Asian Tour. Strong competitive fields across Asia.
